channel.title: Comments on: Sleeping
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I've made my bedroom a cat-free zone, so there are no such night time adventures.
item.content:encoded: I’ve made my bedroom a cat-free zone, so there are no such night time adventures.

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: If that were me, there would be a cat crossing the path at least two or three times, walking over me or sleeping on top of me...
item.content:encoded: If that were me, there would be a cat crossing the path at least two or three times, walking over me or sleeping on top of me…

item.title: By: Echo
item.dc:creator: Echo
item.description: I've heard that a lot of motion during sleep is pretty common. It's amusing to watch.
item.content:encoded: I’ve heard that a lot of motion during sleep is pretty common. It’s amusing to watch.

item.title: By: Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: A little too reminiscent of Paranormal Activity....
item.content:encoded: A little too reminiscent of Paranormal Activity….

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I have an old Canon Powershot G5. I imported the photos into Photoshop and then Flash.
item.content:encoded: I have an old Canon Powershot G5. I imported the photos into Photoshop and then Flash.

item.title: By: Marc
item.dc:creator: Marc
item.description: What camera/software did you use to set that up?
item.content:encoded: What camera/software did you use to set that up?
